function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases such as Zika, H1N1, and COVID-19 leading to social and political tensions","Impact":"Conflicts between governments, businesses, and citizens, leading to protest and barricades","Mitigation":"Improved communication, transparency, and cooperation between stakeholders; awareness campaigns on disease control and prevention","Technologies":"Digital platforms for transparency and communication, disease tracking and monitoring technologies","People":"City residents, businesses, local governments, state governments, national governments, citizens living in affected areas","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Failure to provide compensation to affected businesses during health crises","Impact":"Loss of trust and financial stability for businesses, leading to legal actions and tensions","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and support mechanisms for businesses during health crises; insurance and compensation policies for affected businesses","Technologies":"Digital platforms for streamlined compensation claims, risk assessment and prediction technologies","People":"Affected businesses, government authorities","Owner":"Legal and regulatory authorities, insurance companies"},{"Description":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of violence and conflicts, breakdown of community trust and cooperation","Mitigation":"Education on safe and effective disease prevention measures, community engagement and support, mental health support for affected individuals","Technologies":"Online education platforms for disease prevention, mental health and counseling services","People":"Local communities, citizens living in affected areas","Owner":"Community leaders, healthcare professionals, mental health organizations"}]}
